texts.name: Waerjak
texts.biography: Waerjak was raised without a tribe and without a family, wandering the land with his foster father, but he never forgot his Barbarian blood. This intelligent and worldly young man now hopes to one day reclaim the long-forgotten glory and honour of his people.

specialty.description: Bellows a fear-inducing war cry, afflicting enemies with Sorrow for 10 turns at the start of combat.
specialty.name: Sorrow
